Package org.CAP5400.RegionOfInterest

Class ROI

java.lang.Object
org.CAP5400.RegionOfInterest.ROI
public class ROI extends Object
This class represents a region of interest in an image. It is used to perform operations on a subset of an image.
See Also:
  • Image

  • Constructor Details

    • ROI

      public ROI(@NotNull @NotNull Image image, int startX, int startY, int totalX, int totalY) throws Exception
      Constructor to create a region of interest from an image.
      Parameters:
      image - The image to create the region of interest from.
      startX - The start x coordinate of the region of interest.
      startY - The start y coordinate of the region of interest.
      totalX - The total x coordinate of the region of interest.
      totalY - The total y coordinate of the region of interest.
      Throws:
      Exception - Error thrown if the region of interest is out of bounds.
